metadata.Title: CVE-2017-2618 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in the Linux kernel's handling of clearing SELinuxattributes on /proc/pid/attr files before 4.9.10. An empty (null) write tothis file can crash the system by causing the system to attempt to accessunmapped kernel memory.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-2618` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic-lpae - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-lowlatency - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-extra-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
No subscription required

linux-image-4.13.0-1005-raspi2 - 4.13.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1001-aws - 4.15.0-1001.1
